div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

p.strong: The school buildings are closed and are currently working with limited staff. If you need to be in touch with your school, please email your respective building administrative assistant or call the District Office @ 472-5561 between the hours of 7:00 AM to 4:00 PM for immediate assistance.
EES - jklug@usd327.org KMS - amontoy@usd327.org EJSH - athompson@usd327.org OR djacobs@usd327.org

div.p: Honoring the Class of 2020 tonight. view image

Class of 2020 - although your year is ending a bit different than we had hoped, know that USD327 will recognize your class starting tonight at 8:20--20:20 military time. The FB and TN lights will be turned on for 20min & 20 sec in your honor. Keep Being GREAT Class of 2020!

Ellsworth, KS 67439
Phone: (785) 472-5561
